MSERNNet.cpp File Reference

Offers the functions to create and to work with a recurrent neural network. The network is combined with the mean squared error measure. This combination is created due to computational efficiency. More...

#include "ReClaM/MSERNNet.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Offers the functions to create and to work with a recurrent neural network. The network is combined with the mean squared error measure. This combination is created due to computational efficiency.
